Generate a grouping vector from docvars

generate_groups.Rd

Internal function to generate a grouping vector from docvars used in dfm.corpus, dfm.tokens, dfm.group, and tokens_group

generate_groups(x, groups, drop = FALSE)

Arguments

x

corpus, tokens or dfm
groups

names of docvars or vector that can be coerced to a factor

Value

a factor

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
